overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains an active social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging a total of 3,580 followers with content focused on social media research, disinformation, and computational methods. Engagement levels vary by platform, with LinkedIn showing the highest individual post engagement.

contentThemes.description: Posts related to studies and findings on social media behaviors and disinformation.
Posts announcing job opportunities and research grants, appealing to the academic community.
Updates on speaking engagements and presentations at scholarly events.

recommendations: Increase content frequency on platforms with higher engagement rates like LinkedIn to capitalize on audience interest.
Utilize visual content or infographics to potentially enhance engagement rates, especially on platforms like LinkedIn and Bluesky.

platformInsights.mastodon: Posts on Mastodon have moderate engagement, with content focusing on methodological discussions in disinformation studies.
platformInsights.linkedin: LinkedIn shows the highest engagement per post, particularly on content related to research announcements and job opportunities.
